title: Optimizing Multicarrier Multiantenna Systems for LoS Channel Charting. (arXiv:2310.03762v1 [eess.SP])
abstract: Channel charting (CC) consists in learning a mapping between the space of raw channel observations, made available from pilot-based channel estimation in multicarrier multiantenna system, and a low-dimensional space where close points correspond to channels of user equipments (UEs) close spatially. Among the different methods of learning this mapping, some rely on a distance measure between channel vectors. Such a distance should reliably reflect the local spatial neighborhoods of the UEs. The recently proposed phase-insensitive (PI) distance exhibits good properties in this regards, but suffers from ambiguities due to both its periodic and oscillatory aspects, making users far away from each other appear closer in some cases. In this paper, a thorough theoretical analysis of the said distance and its limitations is provided, giving insights on how they can be mitigated. translated_title: 优化LoS信道建模中的多载波多天线系统
translated_abstract: 信道建模通过学习将多载波多天线系统中基于导频信道估计得到的原始信道观测空间与低维空间进行映射，其中接近的点对应于空间上靠近的用户设备（UE）的信道。在学习这种映射的不同方法中，有些依赖于信道向量之间的距离度量。这样的距离应该可靠地反映UE的局部空间邻域。最近提出的相位不敏感（PI）距离在这方面具有良好的性质，但由于其周期性和振荡性而产生歧义，在某些情况下使远离彼此的用户看起来更接近。本文提供了对该距离及其局限性的深入理论分析，从而揭示了如何缓解这些问题的见解。因此，得出了设计能够学习优质信道图的系统的指导方针。
tldr: 本文分析了相位不敏感距离在LoS信道建模中的局限性，并提供了缓解这些问题的指导方针。
en_tdlr: This paper provides a thorough analysis of the limitations of phase-insensitive distance in LoS channel charting, and proposes guidelines for mitigating these issues.
